attributes.action: confirm that 100% of any 'Green taxes' raised will be ring fenced  for green issues and alternatives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Not that we dont trust government's when they talk about raising environmental taxes to reduce green house gases etc 

But i do expect 100% of the revenue received be used to find and support alternatives to fossil fuels. Not as a scam to raise taxes for other issues

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
